detail_desc: Jumper in a soft, rib knit with a stand-up collar, a visible zip at the front and long sleeves.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Narrow, decorative piping down the legs and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with hard-worn details and patches on the inside of the legs. Adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and narrow hems.
Straight-cut sports top in fast-drying mesh with short sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. The polyester content of the top is recycled.
5-pocket jeans in washed cotton denim in a relaxed fit with a zip fly and button, and tapered legs. The jeans are made partly from recycled cotton.
Baby Exclusive. Sleeveless bodysuits in soft, ribbed organic cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder and press-studs at the crotch.
Dress with a round neck with buttons at the back and a gathered seam and decorative bow at the waist. Flared skirt in several layers of glittery tulle. Lined.
Jersey hipster briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.

Padded parka with a lined, faux-fur trimmed hood and a zip with a wind flap and press-studs down the front. Handwarmer pockets, flap front pockets and a small zipped pocket on each sleeve. Inner ribbing at the cuffs. Quilted lining.
Cropped top in a fine waffle knit with narrow shoulder straps, a gentle V-neck, decorative buttons and gathers at the top, and an overlocked hem.
Joggers in soft velour with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Gloves in a felted wool blend with imitation suede palms, an adjustable tab with press-studs at the top and ribbed cuffs. Fleece lining.
Baby Exclusive. Romper suit knitted in soft, organic cotton with flutter sleeves, buttons down the front and long legs with a narrow, ribbed trim at the hems.

Sandals in grained leather with adjustable straps with metal buckles and concealed elastication. Adjustable heel strap with a hook and loop fastening and a loop at the back. Moulded suede insoles and fluted rubber soles.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a print motif on the front.
Lace-trimmed jumper in a soft, fine knit with a V-neck front and back, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Pyjamas in soft, printed cotton jersey. Short-sleeved top with a rounded hem. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Short jacket in soft faux fur with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners at the front and concealed front pockets. Jersey lining.

Wide trousers in woven fabric with a zip fly, concealed hook-and-eye fastener and a detachable belt with a covered metal buckle. Side pockets, fake back pockets and straight legs with creases at the front.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with short sleeves, a mesh yoke at the front, large mesh panel at the back and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
No-show socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elastication around the tops. The socks are designed to be hidden inside your shoes.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Warm-lined boots in imitation patent leather with lacing at the front, a zip in one side and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and chunky, patterned soles.
Knee-length skirt in woven fabric with a slight sheen. High waist with a tab and metal buckle at the side of the waistband, and a wrapover front with an inner button. Unlined.
Short coat in sturdy felted fabric with a zip down the front and flap front pockets. Lined.
Fitted top in a soft rib knit with a V-neck and long sleeves.
Soft, non-wired, push-up bra with decorative straps and moulded, padded triangular cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps, elasticated hem and no fasteners.
Patterned swimsuit with a frill at the top and on the shoulder straps, and a small bow at the back. Lined gusset.
Slim, high-waisted trousers with a zip at the top.
Sandals with a heel strap with covered elastic at the back. Imitation leather insoles.
Mules in braided imitation leather with pointed toes, imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel approx. 6 cm.
Lightly padded, velvet-covered Alice band.

Single-breasted jacket in a textured weave with notch lapels and buttoning at the front. Fake pocket with a decorative handkerchief at the top and fake flap pockets at the front. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Padded slippers in jersey with an embroidered motif at the top. Fleece linings. pile insoles and soft soles with anti-slip protectors.
Calf-length, A-line dress in jersey crêpe with wide, frill-trimmed elasticated shoulder straps and a deep neckline at the back with covered elastication and horizontal ties. Lined.
Padded jacket in woven fabric with a detachable hood, stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, and zipped front pockets. Pile lining.
Skinny-fit treggings in superstretch twill with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Long dress in jersey with a slight sheen. V-neck, short cap sleeves, a seam with draping at the waist and a high slit at the back. Unlined.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and wide legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with a ribbed polo neck and dropped shoulders. Long, wide sleeves with ribbing and decorative, pearly buttons at the cuffs, and ribbing at the hem.
Fine-knit jumper in soft cotton with long sleeves and a hood with a wrapover front and decorative drawstring. Ribbing around the hood, cuffs and hem.
Short, high-waisted shorts in woven fabric with a concealed zip in the side, side pockets and laser-cut scalloped hems.
Hat in a soft rib knit with a fold-up hem.
Top in washed jersey with narrow shoulder straps and deep armholes in a wide style with a decorative seam at the back. Raw-edge, rounded hem that is short at the front and longer at the back.
Baby Exclusive. Dungarees in soft, pattern-knit organic cotton with straps that cross and fasten at the back with adjustable buttoning, and ribbed hems.
Maxi skirt in an airy weave. High waist with covered elastication and a drawstring with tassels at the ends. Gathered tiers for added width and soft draping. Lined with a short jersey skirt.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave. Regular waist with concealed elastication, zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, side pockets, fake back pockets and tapered legs.
Long dress in patterned viscose jersey with smocking at the top and narrow shoulder straps.
Trousers in an airy viscose weave with a high waist, concealed zip in one side and wide, straight legs with slits at the hems.
Dress in viscose crêpe with short open sleeves with ties.
Two-part hoop earrings in silver-plated metal. Size 3 cm.
Double-layered hats in soft cotton jersey.
Knee-length shirt dress in a patterned viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Detachable tie belt at the waist and high slits in the sides. Unlined.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elastication around the top.
5-pocket skinny-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist and zip fly.
Jumper in a soft knit with a round neck, gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Corduroy trainers with a hook and loop fastening at the front and loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops. The cotton content of the socks is organic.
Sleeveless blouse in airy chiffon with a collar, buttons down the front, yoke with a pleat at the back and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Shoes in a cotton weave with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and fluted soles.

Set with a short-sleeved jersey Henley top and twill pair of shorts. Top with a button placket and a small fabric appliqué above the hem. Shorts with an elasticated, drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and a back pocket.
Jumper in fine-knit cotton with buttons on one shoulder, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Wide metal rings in various designs.
Long-sleeved top in cotton piqué with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Skirt in a soft Tencel™ lyocell weave with an elasticated paper bag waist, tie belt and side pockets.

All-in-one suit in soft, thermal fleece with a pile-lined hood with sewn-on ears. Zip down the front that continues down one leg and has a chin guard at the top, long sleeves and narrow ribbing at the cuffs and hems. Unlined.
Short-sleeved dress in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front, a deep neckline at the back with crossover straps, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Oxford shoes in leather with closed lacing and pointed toes. Leather linings and insoles. Heel 2.5 cm.
Sleeveless bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch.
V-neck cardigan in marled sweatshirt fabric with a shawl collar, buttons down the front, side pockets, elbow patches and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Shirt in airy cotton with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Cropped vest top in ribbed jersey with metal press-studs down the front.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Plastic hair claw. Width 4.5 cm.

Hi-tops in imitation leather with a motif and reflective details. Padded edge and tongue, elasticated lacing and a hook and loop tab at the front and a loop front and back. Linings and insoles in mesh made partly from recycled polyester, and patterned soles.
Vest tops in soft, ribbed organic cotton jersey.
Hipster briefs in organic cotton jersey with lace trims. Low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and narrow hems.
Baby Exclusive. Sun hat in a soft weave lined in a cotton weave. Ties under the chin (not in size 0-4M).
